DOC.brief_title: A Randomised Controlled Trial Between Two Different HDR Brachytherapy Schedule Locally Advanced Carcinoma Uterine Cervix
DOC.detailed_description: Cervical cancer second common cancer among woman worldwide commonest form gynecolgic malignancy Bangladesh.Radiotherapy form external beam radiotherapy combine intracavitary Brachytherapy accept definitive mode treatment.Limiting number high dose rate ( HDR ) Brachytherapy potential benefit improve patient compliance reduce treatment cost duration.The aim study compare treatment outcome acute complication follow treatment 9 Gray ( Gy ) two fraction brachytherapy standard EBRT locally advance carcinoma cervix . EBRT deliver cobalt 60 teletherapy unit prescribe dose 50 Gy 25 fraction 2 Gy per fraction 5 day week period 5 week concurrent inj . Cisplatin 40 mg/meter square weekly 5 weeks.The patient randomise two arm HDR brachytherapy , either 9Gy 2 fraction 7 Gy 3 fractions.All patient follow per guideline 6 months.The treatment related toxicity measure Common Toxicity Criteria ( Common terminology criterion adverse event v.3.0 ) . All relevant collect data compile master chart statistical analysis result obtain use SPSS 17.The data analyse use Chi square test T test.Significant value decide level 0.05 two tailed test .
